title: The Secret to Spiritual Growth
description: God has imprinted upon our hearts the ability show His love through how we live everyday. We all yearn to grow closer to the Lord but get distracted by all of the negativity life can throw our way.  Bestselling Author Jacob Kodesh unveils the key to what causes us to become more Christ-like and how that prepares us to receive blessings from God.
author: Jacob Kodesh
